# What is this
This is where I write every chunk of my random thoughts, üöøshower thoughts, political opinions, random facts, wishlist, etc.

/ideas/By-the-Sea.title: By the Sea
/ideas/By-the-Sea.content: Sit by the sea with your friends online

/ideas/burgershack.title: Burger Shack
/ideas/burgershack.content:
A simple burger shop game. Idea by [TacoShack Economy Discord Bot](https://tacoshack.dev/). Where you make / sell burgers and sell them. By time, you'll have automation and create restaurant chain like McDonalds.

## What to do
- Creating / Selling burgers with time guage
- Hiring chef
- Upgrading the shack for multipliers
- Small events to boost/sabotage the shack

### References
- [Cookie Clicker (dashnet.org)](https://orteil.dashnet.org/cookieclicker/)
- [TacoShack Economy Discord Bot](https://tacoshack.dev/)

/ideas/clippy.title: Clippy
/ideas/clippy.content:
A quick clipboard for writing down quick notes.

# Todo
- Postgres / MongoDB Database
- Discord Bot with command to create a clip
- Web Client with Discord Auth for UID
---

Format:

`[category]: [content]` 

Example:

`todo: water the plants`

![Example Dashboard](../images/clippy.png)

/ideas/its01.title: ITS 01
/ideas/its01.content:
A web to remember and mark down the history of the first ITS class.

Ideas
- Timeline of every people who left and joined

/ideas/justtrains.title: Just Trains
/ideas/justtrains.content:
A study-like website to watch trains.

Maybe explain how I love it and how good it is.

/ideas/languagedoc.title: Language Documentation
/ideas/languagedoc.content:
A documentation for languages written in **English**.

It will teach about that language in the same format.

Documentation will be written like a library documentation.

/ideas/tell-the-duck.title: Tell the Duck
/ideas/tell-the-duck.content:
A theraphy website. Idea by [Rubber duck debugging - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rubber_duck_debugging) but instead of fixing your bugs, it'll hopefully help with your sadness, stress, anxiety or whatever.


## What to do
- Input where the user tells how they feel and what they're doing.
- Maybe use that to share with others to let them help
- Or create automation of somesort that the duck will talk to you to help

/ideas/the-space.title: The Space
/ideas/the-space.content:
A cozy website with a fireplace and a clock. Kinda like a studying website but for people who are sad. Built from Pat's desired ideal cozy place.

## What to do
- Clock
- Spotify Music
- Ghost Pal

### References
- [Lifeat.io](https://lifeat.io)
- [IMissMyCafe](https://imissmycafe.com)
- [Noisli](https://noisli.com)

/ideas/timewheel.title: Pat's Time Wheel
/ideas/timewheel.content:
Display the time schedule of my day as a wheel.

Maybe create this as a template for others to create.

/ideas/untitled-train-game.title: Untitled Train Game
/ideas/untitled-train-game.content:
A game inspired by the Netflix Series **Snowpiercer**

## What to do
- Basic Movement - Q/E Accelerate
- ZOOM Fast Movement

[World Map](https://www.reddit.com/r/snowpiercer/comments/m3m140/detailed_snowpiercer_route/)

/thoughts/countries.title: Countries that I would like to move to
/thoughts/countries.content:
# The Netherlands
- Bike
- Education
- Non car-centric

# Japan
- Anime
- Non car-centric

# New Zealand
- 90% of electricity produced are renewable
- Beautiful country

# France
- Nuclear power
- French sounds nice

# Germany
- German sounds cool
- Beatiful cities
- Good food
